name: Nile
hint: Longest river in Africa, flowing north through Egypt to the Mediterranean

name: Congo
hint: Deepest river in the world, flows through the heart of Central Africa

name: Niger
hint: Third-longest river in Africa, makes an unusual boomerang curve through West Africa

name: Zambezi
hint: Fourth-longest river in Africa, home to Victoria Falls

name: Limpopo
hint: River forming the border between South Africa and Botswana/Zimbabwe

name: Orange River
hint: Longest river in South Africa, flowing west to the Atlantic

name: Senegal River
hint: West African river forming the border between Senegal and Mauritania

name: Blue Nile
hint: Major tributary of the Nile, originates from Lake Tana in Ethiopia

name: White Nile
hint: Longer tributary of the Nile, flowing from Lake Victoria

name: Volta
hint: Major river in Ghana, dammed to form one of the world's largest reservoirs

name: Okavango River
hint: One of few major rivers that never reach the sea, ending in a delta in Botswana

name: Gambia River
hint: Major West African river that gives The Gambia its name and shape

name: Kasai River
hint: Major tributary of the Congo River, flowing through Angola and DRC

name: Ubangi River
hint: Largest right-bank tributary of the Congo, forms part of the DRC-Congo border

name: Jubba River
hint: Major river in southern Somalia, flowing into the Indian Ocean near Kismayo

name: Tana River
hint: Longest river in Kenya, flowing east from the highlands to the Indian Ocean

name: Rufiji River
hint: Largest river in Tanzania, creating a vast mangrove delta on the Indian Ocean

name: Benue River
hint: Major tributary of the Niger River in Nigeria, meeting it at Lokoja

name: Shire River
hint: Only outlet of Lake Malawi, flowing south through Malawi to the Zambezi

name: Atbara River
hint: Last major tributary of the Nile before it reaches the Mediterranean, in Sudan
